results.title: Noguchi, a sculptor's world
results.brief_description: A film biography of Isamu Noguchi, a foremost modern twentieth century artist, whom Buckminster Fuller called “The comprehensive artist without peer in our time”. Speaking directly to his audience and narrating the film, Noguchi lends insight into his thinking, philosophy and versatile creative life.
results.description: A film biography of Isamu Noguchi, a foremost modern twentieth century artist, whom Buckminster Fuller called “The comprehensive artist without peer in our time”. results.title: Noddy goes to the fair (K)
results.creator_credit: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Chris Taylor, Brian Cosgrove, Mark Hall and Simon Bosanquet
results.brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. On a very windy day in Toy Town, a fair comes to town. Mr Plod tries to take away Noddy’s car, but when Bumby retrieves Mr Plod’s hat at the fair he lets Noddy go. Narrated by Richard Briers.

results.title: Noddy goes to school
results.creator_credit: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
results.brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. A series of incidents cause Noddy to come to the realisation that he should go to school to learn to read. Narrated by Richard Briers.

results.title: Noddy gets into trouble (K)
results.creator_credit: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
results.brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. Noddy feels he is starting an “extra special” day and then finds he is suspected of theft of cakes and tarts because his cap bell was heard at the scene. The townspeople shun him as further thefts occur, but in the end, with the help of Big Ears and Little Ears, Noddy captures the real thief and presents him to Mr Plodd the Policeman. Narrated by Richard Briers.

results.title: Noddy be brave (K)
results.creator_credit: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
results.brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. Noddy is looking forward to visiting Big Ears on his day off, but a car accident means he must find alternative transport for his taxi service. While Noddy’s car is in the shop, Mr Honk from Car Town starts up his own taxi service in Toy Town. Noddy and Big Ears must devise a plan! Narrated by Richard Briers.

results.title: Noddy and Tessie Bear (K)
results.creator_credit: CPL, Stop Frame Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
results.brief_description: Based on the Noddy stories by Enid Blyton. Noddy helps Tessie Bear sell her eggs on market day after which they then buy a kite to fly in the strong wind, in a nearby farmer’s paddock. They tie the kite to a milk churn and a basket full of eggs, and the kite lifts the milk and eggs aloft raining milk and eggs on the market before eventually Noddy comes to the rescue. Narrated by Richard Briers.

results.title: Nobody will speak of us when we are dead = Nadie hablara de nosotras cuando hayamos muerto [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Edmundo Gil Casas, Flamenco Films SA, Xaloc SA, Renin and Agustin Diaz Yanes
results.brief_description:
Gloria turns to prostitution to support her alcohol addiction after her bullfighter husband is seriously injured. We first see Gloria on the job for a group of Mexican money launderers. Things go awry when one of the clients, an undercover DEA agent is murdered. Gloria is the only witness, and after a pique of generosity, is handed a list of contacts in Spain. Eventually deported, Gloria returns to Madrid, contacts in hand, to the home of her mother-in-law and invalid husband determined to start a new life but is pursued by one of the hitmen. An interesting subplot involves his daughter’s illness exacerbated by her father’s profession, seemingly as an act of God. Hailed as a Spanish “Pulp fiction”, “Nobody will speak of us when we’re dead” received the 1995 Goya Award for Best Picture. In Spanish with English subtitles.
Cast includes: Victoria Abril, Pilar Bardem, Federico Luppi

results.title: Nobody waved good-bye
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly, Roman Kroitor and Don Owen
results.brief_description: A story of teenage conflict - the predicament of a youth who rebels against his parents’ middle-class goals and conventions. Away from home and high school he finds the world a cold place to go it alone. Ideals are no defence when the need dor money leads to shady practices. This feature film is a study of the sources of delinquency in an affluent society, mirroring many of the problems and frustrations of young people. Cast includes: Julie Biggs, Peter Kastner, Charmion King, Ron Taylor, John Vernon.

results.title: Nobody told me
results.brief_description: So that “nobody told me” is no longer an excuse, the film carefully explains how floods occur and, also, the work of the Grand River Conservation Authority in Ontario, Canada, to police the flood plain regulation. The regulation itself is explained in great detail.
